It turns out that I had an unused import (that is an error by preference) and 
a class with no import statement elsewhere in the class. Performing an 
organize imports fixed the problem.

Do you still have the source where that happend? Do you have a stack trace with
line numbers?
Is is a strange bug, I don't really know how this could have happend, the
null-checks are all there.

I tried to recreate the situation in the same source file and couldn't. If 
there is no holes in the code, perhaps it is a JIT or VM bug. I'm using VM ibm-
java2-ws-jre-pj9n131-20030627.

set to 'worksforme'
please reopen if you get this again. thanks!
